parameters.name: result
parameters.description: path to the file used to write the transforms (default "transforms.trf")

parameters.name: shakiness
parameters.description: how shaky is the video and how quick is the camera? 1: little (fast) 10: very strong/quick (slow) (from 1 to 10) (default 5)

parameters.name: stepsize
parameters.description: region around minimum is scanned with 1 pixel resolution (from 1 to 32) (default 6)

parameters.name: mincontrast
parameters.description: below this contrast a field is discarded (0-1) (from 0 to 1) (default 0.25)

parameters.name: show
parameters.description: 0: draw nothing; 1,2: show fields and transforms (from 0 to 2) (default 0)

parameters.name: tripod
parameters.description: virtual tripod mode (if >0): motion is compared to a reference reference frame (frame # is the value) (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

filters.name: vidstabtransform
filters.label: Vidstabtransform

parameters.name: input
parameters.description: set path to the file storing the transforms (default "transforms.trf")

parameters.name: smoothing
parameters.description: set number of frames*2 + 1 used for lowpass filtering (from 0 to 1000) (default 15)

parameters.name: optalgo

parameters.name: maxshift
parameters.description: set maximal number of pixels to translate image (from -1 to 500) (default -1)

parameters.name: maxangle
parameters.description: set maximal angle in rad to rotate image (from -1 to 3.14) (default -1)

parameters.name: zoom
parameters.description: set percentage to zoom (>0: zoom in, <0: zoom out (from -100 to 100) (default 0)

parameters.name: optzoom
parameters.description: set optimal zoom (0: nothing, 1: optimal static zoom, 2: optimal dynamic zoom) (from 0 to 2) (default 1)

parameters.name: zoomspeed
parameters.description: for adative zoom: percent to zoom maximally each frame (from 0 to 5) (default 0.25)

parameters.name: interpol
parameters.description: set type of interpolation (from 0 to 3) (default bilinear)

parameters.name: tripod
parameters.description: enable virtual tripod mode (same as relative=0:smoothing=0) (default false)

parameters.name: debug
parameters.description: enable debug mode and writer global motions information to file (default false)
